main_definition: Associates can refer to people one works with or has a connection with, as well as the act of connecting ideas or things together.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A person who works for or is connected with an organization, institution, or individual
meanings_and_examples.example: John is an associate lawyer at Smith & Associates law firm.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To connect in thought or feeling; to form a mental association between ideas or things.
meanings_and_examples.example: The song reminded me of my college days, and I associated it with the friends we had back then.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A partner who shares similar interests, tastes, or values; someone you spend time with socially or professionally.
meanings_and_examples.example: Sarah enjoys spending her weekends with her associates from the photography club.
